Miscellaneous Highlights: Intermittent cloud cover is expected in Bengaluru at the start of the game in the morning, with the temperature around 24Â°C.
There is around a 3-6% chance of rainfall, as the wind gusts will be blowing at a speed of 24-28 km/h.
The cloud cover will be nearly 73%, with humidity levels of around 86%.
However, during the afternoon, the weather will be mostly cloudy with a couple of showers and a thunderstorm with nearly 68% chances of precipitation.
Others: New Zealand will lock horns with Pakistan on Saturday in a day match in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.
The team that wins the match will bolster its chances of qualification for the semi-finals.
New Zealand will come into this match with a three-match losing streak, while Pakistan is coming off a win against Bangladesh after four successive losses.
